devdoc.author: Set Protocol SetTokenCreator is a smart contract used to deploy new SetToken contracts. The SetTokenCreator is a Factory contract that is enabled by the controller to create and register new SetTokens.

params._components: List of addresses of components for initial Positions
params._modules: List of modules to enable. All modules must be approved by the Controller
params._units: List of units. Each unit is the # of components per 10^18 of a SetToken

returns._0: address                Address of the newly created SetToken

devdoc.title: SetTokenCreator

create(address[],int256[],address[],addr.notice: Creates a SetToken smart contract and registers the SetToken with the controller. The SetTokens are composed of positions that are instantiated as DEFAULT (positionState = 0) state.
